content: expression “raise the stakes [surènchere?]” belongs only to my mother
have never loved anything but the impossible
[Saint Augustine] SA: why do we confess to God, when he knows (everything about us)
I always dream of a pen that would be a syringe, a suction point instead of a hard weapon to inscribe, choose, calculate > no risk of bad taste or violence, glorious appeasement
say and do something of an avowal w/out truth turning, avowal w/out “hymn,” w/out “virtue”
unforgettable circumcision has carried me to the place I had to go
circumfession never circumpletes itself, unsealing abandoning the circle open, as long as blood continues its venue in my veins > vein can’t be closed by textual machine or program
[Bennington like Augustine’s God, G.]
Derrida spent his life teaching so as to return to what mixes prayer & tears w/ blood
Derrida’s mom: “I have a pain in my mother”
“I posthume as I breathe” > G. will have written for me, in my favor
[on Bennington’s lack of quotations]: if sentences are proper names, G. is circumcising me, doing w/out my body, producing “logic” or “grammar”

beyond G.’s program, G.’s generative grammar: surprise salvation of a backfire, something in the past withdrawn (if not content at least in the sap of the idiom) from effusion of the signature > obliging G., the other, “forgetting me on pretext of understanding me”
nonsuturable, nonsaturable singularity of event: a perjury in G.’s machine
do those reading me (from up there) see my tears (prayers)? incessant return of “I want to kill myself” (less desire to kill myself than compulsion to overtake each second)
“I see myself live” translates “I see myself die”
“if I did not begin and end by loving you in my private language deprived of you”
horrible expression I win, I like neither the word nor the thing, thus my indefinite referral (so-called negative theology, play w/ names of God)
act of writing as perverse overbidding of crime to exhaust evil, evil I committed in truth, the worst
“writing is only interesting in proportion and in the experience of evil”
essential truth of avowal having nothing to do w/ truth
“this writing that resembles the poor chance of a provisional resurrection”
I write btwn 2 resurrections, the one given, the one promised > becomes a calcinated root, a photographed wound: bedsore cauterized by light of writing—to fire, to blood, to ash
Derrida’s “sublime” encyclopedia on circumcision, which he’ll never do anything w/
for years [praying], I’ve tried to take [God, my mother] as a witness not to see myself being seen but to re-member myself around a single event
“I am for an aristocracy w/out distinction, therefore w/out vulgarity, for a democracy of the compulsion to the highest price, you have to pay the price to read the price displayed”

motif.title: SOCIAL / COMMODITY / COMMERCE / MARKET see COMMUNITY

content: pri, prendre, pris, prier, Proust; anger/irony at Proust’s Franco-Brittanic decorum (Joyce, Heidegger, Wittgenstein): work in which there are theories leaves its price tag > grimace of a good taste naive enough to think it can efface labor of theory: I write w/ price on display

motif.title: SOCIAL / COMMODITY / COMMERCE / MARKET see COMMUNITY

content: I know, dead jealous, I am not the contemporary of those I mentioned yesterday: I belong to the blind man blackmailing me
avowal is always a denouncing of self (still weaving cloth of affabulation dating from SP)
the cruelty of circumcision, the mother’s cruelty: she had to eat the still bloody foreskin [sublime gate of fellatio, mohels]
circumcision: all I ever wrote about
“I am the last of the eschatologists,” like no one else, I made the eschaton into my coat of arms, lips’ edge of my truth
secret I’m jealously seeking as last word of my jealousy, continually turning around it w/out knowing secret of my suffering
if this book doesn’t help me love life even more, give me a divine smile in face of death, it will have failed: I want to succeed where I’m the only one to know it
desire for literature is circumcision, text read does not suffice, has to be eaten, sucked; Derrida is talking about conscious secrets: no one has yet said anything about the secret as known
“a sleeping water [mother, too human inhuman, mortal immortal] in the henceforth appeased depth of the abyss, this volcano I tell myself I’m well out of”
the hidden name [Elie] is the given name, a certain nobility, a sign of election
literary confessions, form of theology as autobiography
“I shall wonder what, from my birth or thereabouts, to turn around has meant”

escarre [mother’s bedsore], oh my jealousy, as long as I have not sutured you, I have not understood you, escarre closes on blood of new skin > as long as I have not written Of the indubitable foundation or the cogito of my jealousy, or again The Confessions of a Mother, I will have failed my life & written nothing: unfathomable perjury, incurable facial paralysis, mask, etc.

I love words too much because I have no language of my own, only false escarres, blackish, purulent crusts which form around my mother’s body, escharosis, English scar, cut, eschatology of my circumcision
“they have never forgiven me for being the most advanced eschatologist, the last avant-garde to count”
like SA, I love only tears
tears, think credulous humanists, are impossible for machines > what stupidity
I perjure like I breathe, whose multitude runs in the tears
I return to dust through love (multiplicity of loves w/out division); I only know how to deceive, deceive myself, deceive you

I’m a dying counterfeiter, lie permanently to everyone, will never reveal full grain of transgressions we’re dying to know, archive [SA on temptation of curiosity, knowledge]; skizzolatry in notebook, colonize and cultivate hell, escarre as sponge; SA accuses/praises God for being monster mother, infinite sea containing finite sponge [this is prior to SA’s conversion]
SA: sought the source of my evil, way of searching was evil, did not see the evil

the 4 PaRDeS “in my blood”: 1) literality denuded 2) crypt, secret, word 3) morality, pulpit eloquence 4) profound, cabbalistic [p. 232 there are at least 4 rabbis] [p. 274 the 4 breaths relaying each other]
man who accuses himself so much of lying must be madly in love w/ truth, to the point of weeping for it
those who are queuing up [for circumcision], too late, authorizing themselves to speak for the “Jews,” don’t know what truth they’re talking about
only philosopher to describe his penis
when young, only liked reading writers quick to tears: Rousseau, Nietzsche, Ponge, SA
nongrammatical syntax that remains to be invented to speak name of God
circumcision, 1st event to write itself on my body, exemplary counterscar we have to read w/out seeing > outside of language, time of a proper name, the rest is literature
“I am the end of Judaism”
disfiguration w/out respite of Augenblick reminds you that you don’t inhabit your face, you take place in more places than you should
a “conversion” outside the writing we’re reading, “in my body,” not decipherable but not illegible: I must teach you to teach me to read myself from the compulsions [baby daddy]
“I do not know if what I am saying to you does good or harm”
“I promised to God never to write anything more except on the most irrepressible of drives, the double condition” [double bind]
word Sony reminds me of the dream in Turin, btwn Rousseau/Nietzsche > my two positive heroes
to those idiots who think computers are harmful to writing, I’ve nicknamed mine subjectile
fixed figures of Freud (Bettelheim too) no longer satisfy me, would sew up chain of all my texts [?]
my writing: cosmonautical, floating in weightlessness, marine, high-tech
foreskin & truth (detour/delay): question of knowing by whom by what the violence of circumcision was imposed
universal fantasy/desire of divided subject (to understand oneself): Envy & Gratitude
future perfect: last ruse of presentations, confessions, conversions, and other peripheral contortions
I’m having a great time, I will have had such a great time, but it costs such a crazy price, that’s what they would like to tell themselves about me

nonknowledge [like smokers who carries their ashtray on them], best condition for having crazy time like a lunatic, opposed to G.’s absolute theologic program > not nonknowledge of martyrdom but of scholar, drawn from the future found in the confession of my memory

my absolute knowledge: writing promised unto death, writing that must come to an end > any reader (addressee) becoming the uncircumcised [son] to be confessed—line thrown to girl-martyrs [wondering why they’re reading Derrida]
operation of circumcision retains essential relation to production of screen
I confess (myself) means I confess my mother means I own up to making my mother own up
[re: SA] fault of mother, remain as mythical as my circumcision

blood mixed w/ saliva, w/ sperm, fellatio, make all the readers drool; p. 158 autofellocircumcision; p. 218 ejaculating into bloody mouth of circumcising mother > exultant alliance, her legs open, breasts btwn my legs, both laughing, passing skin from mouth to mouth like a ring
the circumcised is the proper
held to secrecy by those who know your secret, share w/ you the open secret, just as useless to make it known, blank sacrifices, like a son not bearing his name [Pierre]
quite rightly I pass for an atheist, what I call God: a voice talking to me w/out saying anything, feminine figure of Yahweh so strange, so familiar to me
too much love in my life, will have gotten the better of me: faithful to my euthanasias
my impossible homosexuality, always associated w/ name Claude
mourning capitalizes, saving loves me [proximity loves Derrida too]
where you hear me no longer, where you hear yourself no longer, I am content to turn around you: you do not even know that you are wearing mourning for me
the satyr galatea that I am, half-mourning satyr > the splitting of the ego, in me, is no transcendental claptrap
I am one of those marranes who no longer say they are Jews even in the secret of their own hearts (and not for authenticity’s sake)
“they are going to try to reconstitute all that, but if they knew they would be scared and wouldn’t even try”

it’s to death I already owe everything I earn, I’ve succeeded in making it, as I have w/ God, it’s the same thing, my most difficult ally > costs a great deal of love, impossible but unfailingly faithful, forgive yourself the hurt you do yourself [death same as God]

I knew how to “zap” even before Television gave me that pleasure, always zapped in writing, Wescheln der Töne [switch tones, cf. EU p. 70 Schelling’s Wechsel der Formen] (leaves other rooted to the spot)
I lied to my mother all the time, as I do to all of you
Elie, élit, et lit, et l’I, elle y…
if you knew, G., my experience of prayers, you would know everything, my “without-interest” in the depths of me, “I” is only misdirection—presumed crime I’m calling circumcision
trying to disinterest myself from myself, destroying “I” before death comes to meet it

intense relation to survival that writing is (no desire that something remain after me), to enjoy this light I’m producing through experimentation of my possible survival, i.e. of absolute death (truth of the world w/out me) [?]
gave into the counterexemplary: only write the impossible > if G. contests me, it’s as a witness who, through countersigning attestation, confirms the counterexample
G.’s countersigning attestation, daring to kill the quotation marks, w/out quoting me, calling me back to a moment when I didn’t yet know what circumcision means [?]
intolerable foreclosure when I write: the already known, loved, that can’t be quoted; gather myself in circle of cum, circus of circum, before the constituting witness I’m always fleeing
impossible to follow my trace, like that of Aids, I only write destinerrancy of desire, you try to calculate itinerary of texts which don’t explode immediately, nothing but fuse
trance, anguish, desire of [Derrida’s] reader: intermittent flame, don’t know when the explosion will come

Latin uum mimes fluid I desire to keep, desire as what is kept, keeping not object but continuum of desire; narcissistic self-involvement: libido returns upon itself at moment of loss (approximative, false jargon)
circumcision (what covers the real, all that is left of a language, culture), threat that makes me write, losing life at this moment, my life is that other that ‘I lose’
puerile, naked faith: whose tribute God is supposed to pay in coin of sensory pleasure
no one will know from what secret I’m writing, that I say so changes nothing
mother’ death: contingent cut of CIR
when I’m not dreaming of making love, or being a resistance fighter (blowing up trains), dream of being in an orchestra w/ my sons—produce w/ them the world’s ecstasy

ci, scie, ciseaux, si, ceci (enormous narcissistic monument), on the ci of circumcision is gathered the interrupted autobiothanatoheterographical opus; never known how to love save in the place of a figure unknown to me
narcissistic monument of my last child, third one, daughter I’ll never have had
those who don’t admit their violence, lack of respect for evil, demand Derrida to “own up!” > to Derrida, this is the shameless forgetting of the fault: economy of the worst
as if anyone could be more severe and pitiless toward me than myself
who do they take themselves for, they don’t know the conversion in me
the other in me, atheist God, infinitely smaller and bigger than I
fear that kills me in face of death, not fear of dying (how simple that would be), but fear of replacing one more dead one before being able to die myself [so dead don’t bury the dead]
invent circumcision, like I am doing here, refounding all religions, playfully
my uncircumcised sons, only people whose judgment I fear
am someOne who the One God never stops de-circumcising, hounds [s’acharner?] herself to make bleed in dispersion: salus in sanguine
‘my life,’ a partition btwn 2 absolute subjectivities, I write by reconstituting partitioned & transcendent structure of several religions
other holds, pulls, separates the skin d’avec my sex in her mouth, makes me sperm
since the computer, have my memory like a sky in front of me
Derrida’s mother never read, never wanted to read, a single word he wrote
G. and I are whispering, confess w/out anyone knowing, like a gift confession from the unconscious (know of no other definition of unconscious)
I don’t have a fantasy of eradication/expropriation but a virtual, mimicked trance, painful pleasure of obsessive ideo-motor drive
[vegetable superepidermis extraterrestrial hedgehog bleed to point of orgasm description]
itching the effect of circumcision to share it w/ others

tearing off my skin like I always do, unmask, de-skin myself, while sagely reading others like an angel, dig down in myself to the blood, in them, so as not to scare you, so as to indebt you toward them, not me
I am erect in my circumcision for centuries (petrified memory, ammonite [fossil index])
just enough breath to ask for pardon, in languages of the PaRDeS, for all the evil that my writing is drawn, withdrawn, drawn out of [animal machine]
intolerable envy, the enjoyment that I am, myself and nothing else
on each date, a drop of blood, one date enough to leave geologic program behind
Spinoza, SA, too marranes, too Catholic
sign of circumcision will ensure Jewish nation an eternal existence > this sign of circumcision & election is foreign to understanding and true virtue
in search of Saint Foreskin, gram of “lost part of self,” has the form of a Ring [objet a?]
day of circumcision: a de-cision was taken in me w/out me > Jealousy & virginity, my two nipples
phantom or prophet charged w/ mission, heavily charged w/ secret unknown to him
chosen race (genus electum) waiting for the envelope to open, seals to break like skins, so that finally, ceasing to eye your pocket, they enter terrible/sweet truth you bear
talking to you, you this god hidden in more than one, a mortal god, I write you my god, to save you from your own mortality
from disaster to sinister, no more height, not sublime, alone w/ everything, crawling, like I wanted?
a word, “cascade” this morning, happens so often, birth of a love affair, origin of the earth

in all the history of humanity, have never known anyone happier, luckier, more euphoric than I (isn’t this a priori true?) > and yet [double bind] remained counterexample of myself: sad, deprived, neurotic, jealous, disappointed
can’t write w/out these two certainties > interest as passionate as it is disillusioned w/ language, literature, philosophy > impossibility to say: “I sign”

never been able to contradict myself, still so young [cf. SW pp. 322-23], unforgettable power of my discourse—they grind even the mute ash, name of God in the ash > so I write, convenient for forgetting

caught up by school; they can’t stand that I say nothing refutable (nor tenable, nor valid), my capacity for silence & amnesia, not a strategy but “violence of the void through which God goes to earth to death in me”
the 4 breaths relaying each other
I’ve been scared, me, in the evening, of the fear I inspire, fear of deathly silence that resounds at my every word
I write to alienate, drive mad those I will have alienated by not saying anything
not interested in principle of selection but this idiom that makes or lets me write
Saint Augustine, whom elsewhere I venerate and envy
Derrida as favorite son: excluded and favorite, at two juxtaposed moments [double bind]
wait for the moment which is looking for me, decision deciding my life w/out me
writing w/out believing in one’s survival, in the inheritance of the last will, writing for the present, a made present, like SA wants to make truth: I don’t take my life, je me donne ici la mort
pronounce an atrociously tragic sentence, make its quotation marks appear, abandoning it to anonymity, putting forward an analysis > for more drama, who more than the other is vulnerable to analysis?
before speech, among Jews alone, there’s circumcision
“I” even w/in same sentence not the same
prison/school: caught up in one, freed from the other [where I write]
where they’ll never get me, they masculine or feminine [Zarathustra], up to the other to invent me
SA: those pages don’t show countenance of this piety, the tears of confession

avowal, even for crime not committed, secretes meaning, order, an intelligibility that arrests > subject constituted by category of this accepted accusation (confines asubjective & endless culpability of chaos)
all my tears (of love), prayers, bleeding like overflow of murders I carry w/in myself, knowing not whether I committed them or not, against the other or against me
spare the sister, she, the password, our lifelong secret, inside of the ring
write to see your sacrificer face on, not to accuse him in turn, but to make truth
dying of a shame in which I persevere all the more in that I have nothing to do w/ it
who am I, if I am not what I inhabit and where I take place: Ich bleibe also Jude
happens only to me (the whole of this circumfession): hubris of the prophet, whose undecipherable letter arrives only at himself, who understands it no better than anyone else

nervous, worried, hunted, literature (beast playing dead, melding w/ foliage), delivering to world impregnable inedible simulacrum, the theory of the parasite virus, terrorizing others w/ instability he carries everywhere, one book open in the other
hear them hear me tremble
recount the “present,” throw G. off course, the present you are making him: Everybody’s Autobiography
“you archive the system, MacWrite Macintosh SE Apple of PaRDeS” [computer]
see yourself overrunning discourse on castration and its supposed substitute

imbecile asks Derrida what he did to help save Jews [didn’t know Derrida was Jewish?] > maybe he was right, perhaps you didn’t do enough to save Jews, always think the other is right, at the beginning or end of the book

hoping, sighing, demanding, invoking, promising that the witness will attest that you will never have had any witness, you alone, whose life will have been so short, you the crossing btwn 2 phantoms of witnesses who will never come down to the same
